alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cameron Island; Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Kenedy Island; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Willacy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 3:16AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kenedy, southeastern Jim Hogg, eastern Hidalgo, Cameron, Brooks and Willacy Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 315 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Encino to 10 miles east of Norias to 11 miles southwest of Itec Campus. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, Weslaco, San Benito, Mercedes, Raymondville, La Feria, Los Fresnos, Progreso, Santa Rosa and South Padre Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
